description:
Yonomori Kobeni is a whiz at housework, has a curvy figure, and is otherwise a completely ordinary high school student. On her 16th birthday, she is suddenly greeted by a fiancee, Mitsumine Hakuya (who is nearly invisible), and his little sister Mitsumine Mashiro (who appears to be a little girl). The two move in with her with little warning. Her sister Yonomori Benio is a pervert with a sister complex. Will Kobeni`s life be turned upside down or not?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Important to Start Off on the Right Foot
Nanigoto mo Saisho ga Kanjin Desu
何事も最初が肝心です
